title: The Hacking of the Carbon Dating Over and Over and Over
post: Out of politeness, I won’t YAWN !
author: ekmcmahon

title: The Hacking of the Carbon Dating Over and Over and Over
post:
Hi Dan,
               I felt just like you when reading his “new” post and I contacted him to ask him why he had to write the very same thing again, again and again. It’s very unlikely that I’ll receive a reply.
author: PHPL
